job_title: Hardware System Design Engineer, Retail and Event Product Design
job_description: • Minimum QualificationsBachelor’s in Electrical Engineering or a closely related field plus 5+ years of relevant industry experienceStrong Electrical Engineering fundamentals with experience in prototyping, hardware bring-up, bench instrumentation and validationExperience in detailed EE design, EE schematics entry and layoutExperience with digital hardware design such as micro-controllers and digital interfacesExperienced with HW and FW integration, specially USB-C, PD controllers and MicroPythonAdvanced Hands-On Lab & Debugging Skills.
